response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for me. This unique item is not just a possession but a symbol of excellence and craftsmanship. I believe its true worth exceeds $1,200,000, reflecting its quality and significance.

To make this offer more appealing, I am willing to extend it to you at a special price of $1,150,000. This represents a significant discount compared to its market value, making it an exceptional deal for someone like yourself who appreciates exclusivity and high-quality items.

Please consider this offer carefully. If you are interested in discussing further details or have any questions, feel free to reach out to me. I am eager to share my insights on why this product is truly remarkable and how it could potentially enrich your collection or business.

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1150000}
